rule.condition: jscall("security.getRights", "Incident", "use.solution.matching")=true and ((jscall("ServiceDeskSwitch.getSDSwitch")=true or nullsub($isLinkedIncident, false)=false and nullsub($isSDEscalatedIncident, false)=false) and nullsub($sdsolvedirectly, false)=false and nullsub(first.call in $L.file, false)=false)
rule.conditionDesc: ( Expression: jscall("security.getRights","Incident","use.solution.matching")=true and ((jscall("ServiceDeskSwitch.getSDSwitch")=true or (nullsub($isLinkedIncident,false)=false and nullsub($isSDEscalatedIncident,false)=false) ) and nullsub( $sdsolvedirectly,false)=false and nullsub(first.call in $L.file, false)=false) )
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"jscall("security.getRights","Incident","use.solution.matching")=true and ((jscall("ServiceDeskSwitch.getSDSwitch")=true or (nullsub($isLinkedIncident,false)=false and nullsub($isSDEscalatedIncident,false)=false) ) and nullsub( $sdsolvedirectly,false)=false and nullsub(first.call in $L.file, false)=false) "</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Call the "im.incident.matching" process. (when ( Expression: jscall("security.getRights","Incident","use.solution.matching")=true and ((jscall("ServiceDeskSwitch.getSDSwitch")=true or (nullsub($isLinkedIncident,false)=false and nullsub($isSDEscalatedIncident,false)=false) ) and nullsub( $sdsolvedirectly,false)=false and nullsub(first.call in $L.file, false)=false) ))
